But after American Idol's smash third season, Fuller sued Simon Cowell , alleging that he had ripped off the Idol format by starting the British version of The X Factor. The battle between Fuller and Simon Cowell that played out in the British courts-this was the undercurrent of everything that went on from the beginning of Sitting in his grand but subdued corner-office suite at the headquarters of Sony Music UK, Simon Cowell spoke about the rift that eventually broke up one of the most successful partnerships in entertainment history.`` I didn't steal anything. I just made a new show as he made new shows, Simon Cowell said while sipping ginger tea and dragging on Kool cigarettes.`` At the point when Idol was launched, we both needed each other... Eric Schmidt and Larry Page said in an interview yesterday that they worked closely with each other and co-founder Sergey Brin on big decisions. The CEO shift won't result in major strategic changes, the executives said. We really agree on strategy, Larry Page said.`` This is really a way of changing the way we're maIan King decisions and the way we're operating. But I definitely don't think there will be any major changes in strategy.''
